summary:
The Security Council,

Noting with regret the resignation of Judge Hisashi Owada, effective 7 June 2018, and the resulting vacancy in the International Court of Justice for the remainder of his term, 

Decides that the election to fill the vacancy shall take place on 22 June 2018 at a meeting of the Security Council and at a meeting of the General Assembly at its seventy-second session, in accordance with article 14 of the Statute of the Court.
